0: I do not like going elsewhere for a spa I like having it on site

Also I had wanted to spend the better part of one day at their spa but it is really not that kind of spa they offer great treatments no complaint there but the space is what older hotels have to do in order to have a spa in the first place they are small and crowded and no water works like a pool or hot tub or even a quiet room with a view
The gym is ample and clean though a little smaller than I expected
The gym was very small and does not seem like it was custom designed more that it was the only available space to put the gym equipment
No pool and one steam room in the spa
Then told me to enjoy my time there at the spa
The front desk dark skin female maybe Middle Eastern told me to use the spa to change my clothes
This time they did manage to get us a table at Ralph Laurens Polo Bar which is not easy
The next morning the staff in the exercise center could not have been nicer even remembering my wifes name as she left

A breakfast for two can cost you over 150There is also a small gym onsite equipped with weights machines and treadmills which is always a bonus unfortunately there are no spa facilities but that really was not an issue for me
